snippet: Oakland signed the free-agent running back Trent Richardson. The Raiders will be Richardson’s third team since he came out of Alabama as the third pick in the 2012 draft.
abstract: Oakland Raiders sign free-agent running back Trent Richardson.
lead_paragraph: Oakland signed the free-agent running back Trent Richardson. The Raiders will be Richardson’s third team since he came out of Alabama as the third pick in the 2012 draft.
